changeSet.createView: SELECT pp.ENTITY_ID, pp.START_DATE, pp.END_DATE, pp.DEAL_TYPE_CODE, pp.CURRENCY_CODE, pp.VOLUME_UOM_CODE, pp.VOLUME_QUANTITY, pp.DEAL_PRICE_VALUATION_CODE, pp.FIXED_PRICE, pp.FIXED_PRICE_CURRENCY_CODE as FIXED_PRICE_CURRENCY_CODE, pp.FIXED_PRICE_UOM_CODE as FIXED_PRICE_UOM_CODE, pp.MARKET_VALUATION_CODE, pp.DEAL_ID, bd.BUY_SELL_CODE, bd.TICKET_NO, fixedFxRf.MARKET_VALUE as FIXED_FX_VALUE, dealPRf.MARKET_VALUE as DEAL_PRICE_RF_VALUE, dealPriceIndex.CURRENCY_CODE as DEAL_PRICE_CURRENCY_CODE, dealPriceIndex.UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE AS DEAL_PRICE_UOM_CODE, dealFxPRf.MARKET_VALUE as DEAL_PRICE_FX_VALUE, marketPRf.MARKET_VALUE as MARKET_PRICE_RF_VALUE, marketIndex.CURRENCY_CODE as MARKET_INDEX_CURRENCY_CODE, marketIndex.UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE as MARKET_INDEX_UOM_CODE, marketFxRf.MARKET_VALUE as MARKET_PRICE_FX_VALUE, pp.COST_1_NAME, pp.COST_1_AMOUNT, pp.COST_2_NAME, pp.COST_2_AMOUNT, pp.COST_3_NAME, pp.COST_3_AMOUNT, pp.COST_4_NAME, pp.COST_4_AMOUNT, pp.COST_5_NAME, pp.COST_5_AMOUNT FROM DEAL_POSITION pp INNER JOIN BASE_DEAL bd ON bd.ENTITY_ID = pp.DEAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FX_RISK_FACTOR fixedFxRf ON fixedFxRf.ENTITY_ID = pp.FIXED_PRICE_FX_RISK_FACTOR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRICE_RISK_FACTOR dealPRf ON dealPRf.ENTITY_ID = pp.DEAL_PRICE_RISK_FACTOR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRICE_INDEX dealPriceIndex ON dealPriceIndex.ENTITY_ID = dealPRf.PRICE_INDEX_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FX_RISK_FACTOR dealFxPRf ON dealFxPRf.ENTITY_ID = pp.DEAL_PRICE_FX_RISK_FACTOR_ID INNER JOIN PRICE_RISK_FACTOR marketPRf ON marketPRf.ENTITY_ID = pp.MKT_PRICE_RISK_FACTOR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRICE_INDEX marketIndex ON marketIndex.ENTITY_ID = marketPRf.PRICE_INDEX_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FX_RISK_FACTOR marketFxRf ON marketFxRf.ENTITY_ID = pp.MKT_PRICE_FX_RISK_FACTOR_ID
